Package ooga.controller

Interface BackEndExternalAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
ModelController
public interface BackEndExternalAPI
Classes that implement this interface are meant to be passed around the front end in order to call the appropriate methods on the back end

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void getAllPossibleMoves​(int row, int col)
    Calls a request to get the possible moves
    void saveCurrentBoardState​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Saves the current state of the game in a file
    void saveCurrentRules​(java.lang.String fileName)
    Saves the current rules of the game in a file
    void setBoardState​(java.lang.String boardFileName)
    Sets the initial state of the board
    void setGameRules​(java.lang.String rulesFileName)
    Sets the rules that the game will follow
    void setGameType​(java.lang.String gameName)
    Sets the type of game that will be played
    void setLanguage​(java.lang.String language)
    Sets the language
    void setPlayer​(java.lang.String playerFileName)
    Sets a player that is playing the game
    void setViewController​(FrontEndExternalAPI viewController)
    Links this half of the controller to the other half that is passed around the back end

  • Method Details

    • setViewController

      void setViewController​(FrontEndExternalAPI viewController)
      Links this half of the controller to the other half that is passed around the back end
      Parameters:
      viewController - The other half of the controller

    • setGameType

      void setGameType​(java.lang.String gameName)
      Sets the type of game that will be played
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game

    • setGameRules

      void setGameRules​(java.lang.String rulesFileName)
      Sets the rules that the game will follow
      Parameters:
      rulesFileName - The name of the file with all the rules

    • setLanguage

      void setLanguage​(java.lang.String language)
      Sets the language
      Parameters:
      language - The language

    • setPlayer

      void setPlayer​(java.lang.String playerFileName)
      Sets a player that is playing the game
      Parameters:
      playerFileName - The string associated with the player name

    • setBoardState

      void setBoardState​(java.lang.String boardFileName)
      Sets the initial state of the board
      Parameters:
      boardFileName - The file name that contains the board

    • saveCurrentBoardState

      void saveCurrentBoardState​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Saves the current state of the game in a file
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to store the game information

    • saveCurrentRules

      void saveCurrentRules​(java.lang.String fileName)
      Saves the current rules of the game in a file
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to save the rules in

    • getAllPossibleMoves

      void getAllPossibleMoves​(int row, int col)
      Calls a request to get the possible moves
      Parameters:
      row - The row of the piece
      col - The column of the piece
